name: accessibility-gateway-load-tests
description: K6 Load Tests for Accessibility Gateway - Optimized Architecture

scripts.test:concurrent-light: k6 run --out json=results/concurrent-light-simple.json --env USERS=20 --env TEST_LEVEL=light --env TEST_MODE=simple scenarios/concurrent-users.js
scripts.test:concurrent-light-full: k6 run --out json=results/concurrent-light-full.json --env USERS=20 --env TEST_LEVEL=light --env TEST_MODE=full scenarios/concurrent-users.js
scripts.test:concurrent-medium: k6 run --out json=results/concurrent-medium-simple.json --env USERS=50 --env TEST_LEVEL=medium --env TEST_MODE=simple scenarios/concurrent-users.js
scripts.test:concurrent-medium-full: k6 run --out json=results/concurrent-medium-full.json --env USERS=50 --env TEST_LEVEL=medium --env TEST_MODE=full scenarios/concurrent-users.js
scripts.test:concurrent-high: k6 run --out json=results/concurrent-high-simple.json --env USERS=100 --env TEST_LEVEL=high --env TEST_MODE=simple scenarios/concurrent-users.js
scripts.test:concurrent-high-full: k6 run --out json=results/concurrent-high-full.json --env USERS=100 --env TEST_LEVEL=high --env TEST_MODE=full scenarios/concurrent-users.js
scripts.test:concurrent-extreme: k6 run --out json=results/concurrent-extreme-simple.json --env USERS=500 --env TEST_LEVEL=extreme --env TEST_MODE=simple scenarios/concurrent-users.js
scripts.test:concurrent-extreme-full: k6 run --out json=results/concurrent-extreme-full.json --env USERS=500 --env TEST_LEVEL=extreme --env TEST_MODE=full scenarios/concurrent-users.js
scripts.test:concurrent-all: npm run test:concurrent-light && npm run test:concurrent-medium && npm run test:concurrent-high
scripts.test:concurrent-all-full: npm run test:concurrent-light-full && npm run test:concurrent-medium-full && npm run test:concurrent-high-full
scripts.test:all-classic: npm run test:smoke && npm run test:load && npm run test:stress

author: Accessibility Team
